Trade/Device Name(s): Precision Xtra Blood β-Ketone Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Abbott Precision Xtra and Optium Blood β-Ketone Test Strips for quantitative measurement of β-Hydroxybutyrate in whole blood using amperometric biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of blood β-Ketone (Beta-Hydroxybutyrate) in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip; for self-testing or healthcare professional use; healthcare professionals may also use venous whole blood samples within 30 minutes of collection; for persons with diabetes and other conditions
